name: search_location_by_name_or_zip_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool climate_data.
Tool description: climate data worldwide
API description: Search for a location by city name or zip code and retrieve forecast key information in the specified language.

city.description: Name of the city to search for. Defaults to 'New York'.

lang.description: Language for the response. Supported values are ['en', 'fr', 'nl', 'es', 'pt', 'it', 'tr', 'gr', 'cz', 'pl', 'ru', 'cn']. Defaults to 'en'.

zipcode.description: Zip code of the city to search for. Defaults to None.
